articles.description: Virgil van Dijk has been criticised by the likes of Jamie Carragher this season while Mohamed Salah has been kept quiet more than usual in a Liverpool shirt.
articles.content: Liverpool's fortunes may not appear as bleak as they did a couple of weeks ago but Jurgen Klopp's side still do not resemble the outfit that has pushed Manchester City all the way in recent seasons.… [+5505 chars]

articles.title: LeBron James pays tribute to 'GOAT' Serena Williams and congratulates her on 'unbelievable' career - Daily Mail
